feed.title: Lychee Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Lychee: v6.6.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

üèï Features

  • Add Persian language and fix LTR and RTL display by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3419
  • feat: Add quick setup to run pgsql locally with tests by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3458
  • Do not log queries which are faster than 100ms by default by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3435
  • fix disappearing header bar on mobile by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3494
  • Add backend and frontend for simple invitation links by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3433

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/compare/v6.6.11...v6.6.12

entry.title: New release for Lychee: v6.6.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

üèï Features

  • feat: Add optional gallery header image by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3491
  • fix: add some missing RTL support on timeline photo display by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3497
  • Fix SSRF + bump version by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3498

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/compare/v6.6.12...v6.6.13

entry.title: New release for Lychee: v6.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

üèï Features

  • Fix photo copy modal not working after a copy by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3508
  • feat : Add ability to manage admins + define Lychee owner by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3506
  • feat: Sync revamped, faster and improved by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3478
  • Add flow backend by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3446

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/compare/v6.6.14...v6.7.0

entry.title: New release for Lychee: v6.7.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

üèï Features

  • Remove annoying check preventing migration on prod database by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3517
  • fix: Fix album not refreshed when importing via url by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3523
  • Add user-group permissions to query by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3425
  • Translations update from LycheeOrg - Weblate by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3528
  • Fix: sort RSS feed query reverse-chronologically by @cdzombak in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3546
  • Improve scrolling UX when exiting photo lightbox by @cdzombak in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3550
  • Fix broken Back button when viewing photo in lightbox by @cdzombak in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3551
  • Explicitly set phpstan memory limit to 512MB by @cdzombak in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3561
  • Allow disabling "swipe up/down to go back" and "scroll to move between photos" gestures by @cdzombak in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3549
  • Include tag in RSS item descriptions by @cdzombak in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3547
  • Version 6.7.1 by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3562

üëí Dependencies

  • Bump the development-dependencies group with 7 updates by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3526
  • Bump the development-dependencies group with 4 updates by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3535
  • Bump the production-dependencies group with 5 updates by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3536
  • Bump the production-dependencies group across 1 directory with 11 updates by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3537
  • Bump form-data from 4.0.2 to 4.0.4 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3554
  • Bump axios from 1.10.0 to 1.11.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3559
  • Bump vue-i18n from 11.1.9 to 11.1.10 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3555
  • Bump maennchen/zipstream-php from 3.1.2 to 3.2.0 in the production-dependencies group by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3553
  • Bump the development-dependencies group with 5 updates by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3552

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/compare/v6.7.0...v6.7.1
